divs: Sighting DetailsIt's still hanging there and everyoine on our street is watching it. I went inside after I noticed they didn;t move at all for some time and took a video. This might not be a big deal, but I always thought UFO guys were just bored or retired. This needs to be seen or at least would like an explanation on the news at 11pm tonight. I was outside airing out my crotch they didn't move drones from creech afb falshing light in a string that hover and are still hovering just kind of curious I didn't as they are still there Everyone in vegas has to see this, it's just too big and obvious
Summary: long string of stationary lights like Phoenix sightings years ago
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Spring Valley
There were no other sightings in Spring Valley on or around August 3rd 2013
